Author: Allison
Title: Anthropic Claude Sonnet 4.5 is in public preview for GitHub Copilot
EnhancedContent:
Claude Sonnet 4.5, Anthropic’s most advanced model for coding and real-world agents, is now rolling out in GitHub Copilot to Copilot Pro, Pro+, Business, and Enterprise. From our early testing, the model brings major upgrades in tool orchestration, context editing, and domain-specific capabilities.

### **Availability in GitHub Copilot**

**Copilot Chat**

Claude Sonnet 4.5 will be available for Copilot Pro, Pro+, Business, and Enterprise. You’ll be able to select the model in the Copilot Chat model picker from:

- Visual Studio Code in chat, ask, edit, and agent mode.
- github.com.
- GitHub Mobile in iOS and Android.

**Copilot CLI**

All users of Copilot Pro, Pro+, Business, and Enterprise will also be able to select Claude Sonnet 4.5 from the new model picker, available in the latest version of the Copilot CLI (v0.0.329).

To switch to Claude Sonnet 4.5, update to the latest version with `npm install -g @github/copilot` , then use the `/model` command.

### **Enabling access**

For all use cases, rollout will be gradual, check back soon if you don’t see it yet.

Enterprise and Business plan administrators must enable the Claude Sonnet 4.5 policy in Copilot settings. Once enabled, users in that organization will have Claude Sonnet 4.5 available in the Copilot Chat model picker and Copilot CLI.

Copilot Free, Pro, and Pro+ users may also bring their own key in Visual Studio Code by selecting **Manage Models** from the picker, choosing Anthropic, and entering their API key when prompted.

### **Learn more**

To explore all models available in GitHub Copilot, [see our documentation on models](https://docs.github.com/copilot/reference/ai-models/model-hosting) and get started with Copilot.

### **Share your feedback**

Have feedback or questions? Join the [community discussion](https://github.com/orgs/community/discussions/174914) to share your experiences and tips.
